name: EPIA SolarPower Europe
goal:
SolarPower Europe, the new EPIA (European Photovoltaic Industry Association), is a member-led association representing organisations active along the whole solar value chain.

Our aim is to shape the regulatory environment and enhance business opportunities for solar power in Europe.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
2030 Climate and Energy Framework
Market design
Retail electricity market and self-consumption schemes
R&D policy
Trade policy
State Aid rules
Ecodesign policy
Digitalisation
Storage
E-mobility
